title: Selena Gomez looks business chic in unique mustard blazer with trousers on press tour in New York
text:
Selena Gomez has made it clear that she's not afraid to make a statement in her music.

She recently took aim at her ex Justin Bieber in her latest track Lose You to Love Me, which appears to have been inspired by their toxic relationship.

The artist also proved she's not afraid to make a statement in her wardrobe, as she rocked an avant-garde look Tuesday in New York City.

Bold look: Selena Gomez proved she's not afraid to make a statement in her wardrobe, as she rocked an avant-garde look Tuesday in New York City

Gomez rocked a long-sleeve mustard yellow top, which featured and an exaggerated layered cowl neck and an asymmetrical pointed hem.

One side of the hem was trimmed with a black leather belt, featuring an unbuckled gold buckle.

The look was paired with some high-waisted black trousers and matching leather pumps.

The 27-year-old completed the ensemble with some silver hoop earrings and a costume diamond ring, accentuating her fresh red manicure.

Mustard yellow: She rocked a long-sleeve mustard yellow top, which featured and an exaggerated layered cowl neck and an asymmetrical pointed hem

Belted top: One side of the hem was trimmed with a black leather belt, featuring an unbuckled gold buckle. The look was paired with some high-waisted black trousers and matching leather pumps

Bling bling: The 27-year-old completed the ensemble with some silver hoop earrings and a costume diamond ring, accentuating her fresh red manicure

She recently released two new singles back-to-back, one of which is believed to be inspired by Bieber.

They had a very on-again, off-again relationship, which lasted from 2010 to 2018, until Bieber tied the knot with Hailey Baldwin.

A source recently told Us Weekly of Lose You to Love Me: 'The song was inspired by Selena’s breakup from Justin, but it would be incorrect to say it’s totally about Justin.

Breakup song: She recently released two new singles back-to-back, one of which is believed to be inspired by ex Justin Bieber

Rave reviews: He pal Taylor Swift recently took to her Instagram story to sing praises of the new track: 'This song is a perfect expression of healing and my absolute favorite song she’s put out yet'

Ride or die: Gomez responded with a selfie of the two of them, calling Swift her 'ride or die': 'I would die for this one'

'It’s actually about finally being able to love yourself and moving on from a toxic relationship.'

He pal Taylor Swift recently took to her Instagram story to sing praises of the new track.

She wrote: 'This song is a perfect expression of healing and my absolute favorite song she’s put out yet. A triumph. I love you so much @selenagomez.'

Gomez responded with a selfie of the two of them, calling Swift her 'ride or die': 'I would die for this one.'
description:
She recently released two new singles back-to-back, one of which is believed to be inspired by Bieber.
They had a very on-again, off-again relationship, which lasted from 2010 to 2018.
